briefTitle: Aspirin Resistance and Stroke Risk: Platelet Function Analysis in Patients With Ischemic Events
officialTitle: Multiphase Study to Determine if Platelet Function Analysis Results Correlate With Ischemic Events and Bleeding Complications
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if PFA results correlate with ischemic event outcomes as well as bleeding complications. Hypothesis is antiplatelet agents will be more efficacious if they are administered in a dose-adjusted manner using PFA results as a guide.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 3-6 months (Collected once between regulalary scheduled follow-up visit between 3-6 months)
